description:
Warm neoprene booties for wet put-ins and portages. Great for traction on your SUP or in snug kayak cockpits.

  • 3mm Terraprene neoprene uppers hold in warmth
  • Rubber rand provide stability and a secure fit
  • 2mm plastic shim adds protection from sharp objects
  • 1.5mm textured rubber sole provides traction in your boat and on land
  • Available in whole sizes only. Size up if you're between sizes, and women should subtract 1 size from those listed
name: NRS Kinetic Watershoes - Unisex
